page.title: 10Simon Groom
page.content: Simon Groom presents the programme {'Blue Peter'}it is a childrens programme that is on T.V. on Mondays and Thursdays on{B.B.C. 1. Simon was an English teacher for two years though he wanted to work on radio. He however, found a job on television and was delighted when it was offerd to him. Eventually though he wants to change onto a different programme. During his childhood Simon lived at Manor Farm, Dethick and spent a lot of time working on the farm in the holidays and when he came home from school. Simon enjoyed his school days, most of all in the 6th form. His worst time was when he had just started. His hobbies are football and music. He likes his job and his ambitions are to work on the radio and to write books.
